parts.text: [SYSTEM: Current Time: 11:19 PM, Date: Saturday, January 17, 2026 | USER: None] Hey, Miro.
Hey there! How can I help you tonight?
[SYSTEM: Current Time: 11:19 PM, Date: Saturday, January 17, 2026 | USER: None] what are you doing
Just hanging out, ready to assist you with anything you need! Mostly waiting for your requests. How about you? Anything interesting happening on your end?
[SYSTEM: Current Time: 11:19 PM, Date: Saturday, January 17, 2026 | USER: None] Nothing.
Alright! Well, if you think of anything you'd like to chat about or need help with, just let me know. I'm here!
[SYSTEM: Current Time: 11:20 PM, Date: Saturday, January 17, 2026 | USER: None] i want to
Okay! You want to...? Tell me more! I'm ready to listen.
[SYSTEM: Current Time: 11:20 PM, Date: Saturday, January 17, 2026 | USER: None] i'm
You're...? I'm all ears! Don't leave me hanging! 😉
[SYSTEM: Current Time: 11:20 PM, Date: Saturday, January 17, 2026 | USER: None] I am getting sleep. Tell me a story.

Okay, getting ready for sleep! I can definitely help with that. Here's a short, calming story for you:

The little firefly, Lumi, lived in a meadow filled with whispering willows and sleepy wildflowers. Every night, Lumi would wake up and blink her tiny light, a gentle beacon in the darkness. One evening, Lumi felt particularly tired. Her light flickered weakly. "Oh dear," she thought, "I don't think I have enough sparkle tonight."

She flew to a nearby willow and whispered her worries to the leaves. The willow gently rustled its branches and said, "Little Lumi, sometimes the best light comes after a good rest. Close your eyes and dream of sunny days and sparkling dew. Your light will be even brighter tomorrow."

Lumi took the willow's advice and nestled among the soft petals of a sleepy poppy. She closed her eyes and dreamt of dancing with other fireflies under a giant, silvery moon. When she woke up, her light shone brighter than ever before. She zipped through the meadow, a tiny, joyful star, happy and full of energy.

Sweet dreams! I hope you sleep well! Let me know if you need anything else.
